titleStmt.title: Two essays of love and marriage being a letter written by a gentleman to his friend, to disswade him from love and an answer thereunto by another gentleman, together with some characters and other passages of wit / written by private gentlemen for recreation.
titleStmt.author: J. H.
A. B.

notesStmt.note: First letter signed: J.H.; second signed: A.B.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
